ptxt.intxrefpoff: CKP (Crankshaft Position) Sensor Removal and Installation:J24B

item.ptxt: Check that O-ring (1) is free from damage.
Check that end face of sensor and signal plate tooth are free from any metal particles and damage.

s1.ptxt: If faulty condition is found, replace CKP sensor.

s2.ptxt: Connect battery (1) and ohmmeter (3) to CKP sensor as shown in figure.
Check that CKP sensor resistance varies as specified below by passing magnetic substance (iron) (2).
If faulty condition is found, replace CKP sensor.

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to keep approximately 1 mm (0.03 in) gap “a” between magnetic substance (iron) and end face of CKP sensor.

spec.title: CKP sensor resistance
spec.ptxt: Resistance varies between less than 220 Ω (ON) and infinity (OFF)
